subject: p15131736
History: -year-old woman with abdominal pain and shortness of breath, evaluate for CHF or obstruction.
Findings: The lung volumes are low with bibasilar opacities silhouetting with the hemidiaphragms and diffuse vascular congestion. There is cardiomegaly and tortuosity of the thoracic aorta. Likely small left pleural effusion. No pneumothorax.
Impression: Findings compatible with pulmonary edema. Likely bibasilar linear atelectasis.
